CanvasRenderingContext2DMiterLimit.summary:
The CanvasRenderingContext2D.miterLimit property of the
Canvas 2D API sets the miter limit ratio.

blockquote.para: Note: For more info about miters, see Applying styles and color in the Canvas tutorial.

CanvasRenderingContext2DMiterLimit.value: A number specifying the miter limit ratio, in coordinate space units. Zero, negative, , and values are ignored. The default value is 10.0.
